title: Killer Bugs (FIX FOR CHING LIU PROTOOLS HD)
description:
Hello everybody I just wanted to try and help everyone out who downloaded PROTOOLS 10HD from 
 <a href="
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7663092/Avid_Pro_Tools_HD_10.3.0_Windows_(Patch-V.R)_[ChingLiu]" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7663092/Avid_Pro_Tools_HD_10.3.0_Windows_(Patch-V.R)_[ChingLiu]</a>

EVERYONE I have met has had issues getting this torrent to run and I figured it out (at least for my system)

Here's what i did

1. Rename the protools .rar file you have to extract as PT and extract it to a folder on your desktop titled PT (this gets rid of the 250 characters error)

2. install like the original torrent says step by step.

3. the included files for licences don't work obtain new ones from this torrent or go find the new one on their website. 

4. do not run the program at all after the pace installation ( if you already tried you need to start make sure this is removed off your computer  completely )

5. Once you do this run the patch included in ching liu's torrent and then run the patch included with mine. 

6. Download and install killerbugs by double clicking on file. ( do not remember where i found this otherwise I'd give credit, but it works. )

7. Restart your computer and prepare for 1st time launch every now and again the MF error appears but just save frequently to avoid loss of data. (note the 1st launch will take forever due to the fact it will be loading all your plug ins dont click on anything else while this loads if it crashes just restart until it goes through you will eventually be able to run the full program)

you guys letme know if this helps.

0. Check the system requirements of the application. IMPORTANT

1. Close your internet connection.

2. Extract "Pro_Tools_10_3_Installer_77531_2.zip" and install the
   application by double clicking on "Setup.exe" 

3. Run the patch "Pro Tools HD 10.3 patch (beta 7).exe". It has russian
   interface, click on left hand side button.
  
4. For your safety, use firewall to stop internet connection of the 
   application.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------    
(Team V.R Notes)

A- If you have following error:

"Error, missing iLok authorization for "Pro Tools 10".
Please insert the necessary iLok and restart Pro Tools."

- Install iLok-LicenseSupportSetup


B- Possible and known patch defects ;

1. maybe some timebomb (Program may stop or expire because of a hidden
   code inside application)
2. not loaded AAX plug-ins with corrupted digital signature (ie cracked)
3. not support Video Satellite Link
4. not work bounce to MP3
